title: Coq au vin with parsley mash
description: Parsley mash adds freshness to this classic French dish of chicken in a rich red-wine sauce. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a potato ricer, muslin cloths (for straining) and a cooking thermometer.
ingredients: 1 bottle red wine, preferably merlot, syrah or burgundy
salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 potatoes, peeled and chopped into chunks
½ bunch flat parsley, finely chopped
